column5: Slip, trip and fall I'm hurt again Tim Connolly signs with the leafs....and for 9.5 Million Dollars for 2 years....  ...that's a lot of money for spending most of it on injured reserve....  http://www.buffalonews.com/sports/sabres-nhl/article475948.ece

When healthy, he was a good third-liner, 2nd penalty killing unit, player. So yes, he's going to be the best center Toronto has until "Big Joe" Colbourne gets a season or two of NHL experience. I'm sure Leaf nation will be very happy to "wait and see" if Burke's plan will pan out   .
I heard he just broke his hand signing the contract
